stop-without-save-confirm: Are you sure you want to exit the timer without saving?
text.hero: CPR Timer supports medical professionals during during cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) and advanced life support (ALS)
features.timer: Independent timers including current cylce, epinephrine and total duration.
features.protocol: Clearly structured reports including a detailed log of all actions taken without any personal data.
features.hts: H&Ts - Chcklist of possible reversible causes of the emergency conditions.
features.rhythm: Rhythm check: VT / VF / PEA / Asystole / ROSC.
